name: Influence (itch) (TeamInfluence)
description:
Manipulate the elements around by the force of attraction of your avatar. Create influence and movement in a basic frozen space.

In Influence, the player controls an Avatar that attracts Fragments that fall into his area of influence. The player can thus change the layout of the game space around him. In addition, he has the possibility to create Astres, which also have an influence on the Fragments as well as on the other Astres. He will be able to create systems of Astres whose energy is not infinite and which will eventually become extinct if they find themselves isolated.

Creators & Roles : 

Alan Caillerez - Programming

Lucas De Gaetano - Programming / Sound Design

Antoine Gilles - Game Design / Sound Design

Remy Hua - Visual Direction

ENG :

Controles : 

Right Clic : Attraction

Left Clic : Repulsion

ZSQD : Movements

AE : Vertical Movements

Space bar: Create Singularity

Shift : Fast Moves

R : Liberation (Become a Fragments)

Cheat/Command

B : Démo

Backspace  : Restart/  Démo -> Game

C : Fast Attraction between Astres (debug collison Astre X Astre Referent

FR :

Controles : 

Clic droit : Attraction

Clic Gauche : Repulsion

ZSQD Déplacement

AE  : Depalcement Verticaux

Espace : Creer singularité

Shift : Deplacement rapides

R : Liberation (Devenez un fragment)

Cheat/Command

B : Scéne démo

Backspace (retour) : recharger le niveau/ Passer Démo -> Jeu

C : Attraction des Astres augmenter (debug collison Astre X Astre Referent
